Title: Vtg Pocket Watch by Arnex, Western Embossed Three HORSE Heads with Pocket knife
Description: This Vtg Western Three Horse Heads, Pocket Watch by Arnex by Lucien Piccard, Swiss Made Movement. Its in full working condition with new battery. Watch door closure works, yet its a heavy door sticks a little yet doesn't take anything away from this Watch. Its from My own collection & just recently found the Pocket Pen Knife, this is rare indeed & makes this set complete now. Bought in the early 1990's. The Horse Heads are Silver layered, Plated, Brass housing, Horse Shoes on every quarter on the face of Watch. Very Unique Item. Overall Its well made, with Embossed raised details on the Pocket Watch & the Pen Knife with full details on both sides. Check the blade photo's and you will see Arnex. Please Study all Photo's & details, No excuses ;) Priced by its condition & rarity with collectable status. Comes with its original Case. No one can compare! All sales final unless damaged during delivery, fully insured. I have 99.3% positive feed back from My Customers, I Thank YOU All ;) Please check out all my Unique Items right here on Ebay!
